summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4627 for the improvement of 27th Avenue West, from Thurman Street to Elmore Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 53868, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
